item.title: [DISTRELEC-8093] Restore FF request distribution with FF 6.9
item.description:
Hallo Herr Spalinger,

danke für die Rückmeldung.

Sie haben zuletzt einen Speicherengpass festgestellt, der mit Swapping - ohne würde zumindest auf dem Master-Server, der RAM zeitweise nicht ausreichen - Auswirkungen auf die Performance haben kann. In diesem Zusammenhang wurde schließlich auch die Anzahl Libraries reduziert.
Es unterscheiden sich aber auch Tomcat und Java von den vorherigen Versionen. Da wir diese Softwarepakete nicht downgraden können, möchte ich vorschlagen, dass Sie zunächst die bisherige Request-Verteilung wiederherstellen.

Bitte teilen Sie mir folgende Werte vor/nach der Umstellung der Requestverteilung und zum Vergleich die Zahlen eines übereinstimmenden Wochentages zu FACT-Finder 6.9, mit:

  • CPU Auslastung
  • RAM Belegung
  • Swap Nutzung
  • JVM Heap-Belegung / GC Aktivitäten
  • Antwortzeiten der initialen Suchanfragen
  • Antwortzeiten der Folgesuchanfragen (Filterung, Sortierung, Paging)
  • Antwortzeiten der Suggestanfragen
  • Antwortzeiten der Navigationsanfragen

Dann können wir am Montag zwischen 10-15 Uhr oder am Dienstag zwischen 9:30-10:30 oder 12-15 Uhr telefonieren.

Unabhängig davon möchte ich empfehlen, dass die u.g. Optimierung bereits bis Mitte kommender Woche eingeplant wird. Andernfalls können einige bereits suboptimal gepflegte Kampagnen, zu einer insgesamt schlechteren Performance in der Suche führen.

Vielen Dank im Voraus.
Schönes Wochenende und Beste Grüße
Gebriyel Türk
FACT-Finder Project Development
item.summary: Restore FF request distribution with FF 6.9

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: attached the old config, which we need to restore.

Hallo Herr Spalinger,
ich habe anhand, des im FACT-Finder integrieren Profilers, die Zahlen geprüft. Folgende Erkenntnisse lassen sich ableiten:

  • Fremdsprachige Channels noch nicht optimiert
    o Es fehlen etwa Stoppwörter in der Konfiguration, diese sind für Freitext-Suchen ein entscheidender Faktor. Wir empfehlen die Konfiguration von Füll-/Stoppwörtern in der Konfiguration (ohne Restrelevanz), die in Suchbegriffen oder Beschreibungstexten vorkommen, um den Wortindex zu verschlanken.
  • Kampagnen Pushed-Products Selektoren nicht optimal eingesetzt
    o Es werden "Listen von Artikelnummern" verwendet, d.h. FACT-Finder führt dann mehrere Nummernsuchen durch, um die zu pushenden Produkte zu ermitteln. Wir empfehlen die Produktliste (nicht parametrisiert) um bessere Antwortzeiten in der Suche zu erreichen.
  • Durchsuchbarkeit der ID-Felder
    o Es gibt weiterhin zu viele ID-Felder, u.a. auch solche, die zusätzlich fehlertolerant durchsucht werden. Wir empfehlen die Aufhebung der fehlertoleranten Durchsuchbarkeit sämtlicher ID-Felder, sofern bereits ein regulärer Ausdruck in der Feldkonfiguration hinterlegt ist, über den die exakte Nummernsuche ausgelöst wird.
    Bitte prüfen Sie, ob o.g. Einstellungen angepasst werden können. Falls danach noch suboptimale Antwortzeiten vorliegen, können wir gerne eine Screensharing-Session kurzfristig ansetzen. Vielen Dank.

New config:

  • FF search requests, each APP server has one FF node (0,1,2,3,4,5)
  • FF tracking and import, FF node 0
  • FF reco and campaign, FF node 6 & 7 & 8

item.title: [DISTRELEC-8019] Error message is missing, when a deactivates customer is trying to login
item.summary: Error message is missing, when a deactivates customer is trying to login

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
The message is displayed only when there is the parameter "logout" set to true. If the deactivated customer tries to login, he will be logged out and redirected to the home page.

if (logout) {
	if ("false".equals(request.getParameter("active"))) {
		redirectModel.addFlashAttribute(GlobalMessages.WARN_MESSAGES_HOLDER, "account.signout.active.error");
	} else {
		redirectModel.addFlashAttribute(GlobalMessages.INFO_MESSAGES_HOLDER, Collections.singletonList("account.confirmation.signout.title"));
	}
	
	return REDIRECT_PREFIX + ROOT;
}
try the URL http://www.distrelec.biz/?logout=true&active=false

@Nabil

This does not work properly, I've tried with a deactivated customer and the parameter "logout=true" was not present.
Could you provide me the customer login details please.

No, I can't because I've fixed this customer.
The problem was a wrong ERP contact id.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-8017] Change text on NPS page LV
item.description:
Hi Ruben,

please replace text on LV NPS page:
https://www.elfadistrelec.lv/feedback/nps?email=peteris.sprogis%40elfa.se&fname=Peteris&namn=Sprogis&lang=%7Blanguage%7D&company=&order=%7Borderno%7D&cnumber=%7Bcustomerno%7D&contactnum=%7Bcontactnum%7D

From - Vai esat apmierināts ar Distrelec? Mūs interesē Jūsu viedoklis
To - Vai esat apmierināts ar Elfa Distrelec? Mums ir svarīgs Jūsu viedoklis

From - Kā Distrelec klients Jūs varat pamatoti gaidīt, ka saņemsiet izcilus pakalpojumus.
To - Kā Elfa Distrelec klients Jūs varat pamatoti gaidīt, ka saņemsiet izcilus pakalpojumus.

From – Send
To – Nosūtīt

Thanks a lot!

Best,
Laura

item.title: [DISTRELEC-7915] Create "Page Restriction" as a new restriction type
item.description:
We need a new restriction type called "Page Restriction" so we are able to show specific components only on one specific page. For instance for these two cases:

  • we only want to show the ceo banner below the category navigation on the homepage
  • on a specific content page we want to add an additional teaser below the category navigation, etc)
item.summary: Create "Page Restriction" as a new restriction type

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Hi Mark,

I have checked in the code in branch/v1. Requires update on the system after deployment. Please test after deployment and update on QA.

Thanks,
Akshay

Hi Mark,

Currently, Inverse functionality wont' work on QA and which will be work after next deployment on QA.

Thanks,
Akshay
Sync is not working properly. It's still referring to the PK of the content page in the staged catalogue instead of changing to the PK of the content page in the online catalogue.
Sorry, It's working fine. I think we have tested in wrong way. Please test it once again and choose the correct contentpage/manufacture page option.

Page restriction is not working properly. It generated more than 40k exceptions yesterday on node 1 when I selected the homepage on the online catalog. When I select the homepage on staged the restriction doesn't work and during the catalog synch we get a system error.

Fixed.
Note: committed into branch v4.1 but since there will be no v4.1.x deployment, the fix version then is v4.2.0.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-7837] Update the Q & P system with latest warehouse configuration
item.description:
Reconfigure the warehouse for all elfa countries based on the following wiki page.

http://wiki.distrelec.com/display/distrelint/ERP+Codelist+-+DistSalesOrg
item.summary: Update the Q & P system with latest warehouse configuration

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Development has been done!!
All the scripts has been updated and impex file too. I have reconfigured the warehouse manualy on P & Q system.

Results can be seen here too http://wiki.distrelec.com/display/distrelint/Warehouse+configuration+-+production

It seems the stock is still not displayed in the shop.
Example for DE shop:
30019168;EF51;53;20151009;0;20151008070045
Example for PL shop:
11061592;ES71;64;20151011;0;20151008070045
11061592;ES71;1338;20151018;0;20151008070045

This Information was sent at 11:24 today morning in the file: erp_stock-20151008112314061.csv_20151008122316021

Could you check this, please?

Hello Urs Bebie | Distrelec

When I checked on the webshop I found the same information present of the webshop for example see this:-

Stock for 30019168
But when I check the shop, no stock is displayed. See screenshots.

Hi Urs Bebie | Distrelec :-
Yes you are right. I too can see the same on the shop. It has wrong availability information on flyout.

This means we have correct stock level in hybris, but the display logic is not correct some how.

Hello Urs Bebie | Distrelec :- I digged deep into this and figure out that stock level information is being displayed on the web by two ways.

  1. For Movex :- We are displaying the stock level based on the file send by ERP. like the one you attached with jira task.
  2. For Sap :- There is an online sap interface for this called IF06_Availability This interface is basically responsible for displaying correct stock information. The webshop is sending the list of all available warehouse and display the information which is coming as a response.

I can see the response is zero for all warehouse available in the DE shope. Here is the request & response for this article.

Request to SAP
===========

 <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:hyb="http://www.distrelec.com/hybris" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/">
   <soapenv:Header/>
   <soapenv:Body>
      <hyb:AvailabilityRequest xmlns:ns2="http://www.distrelec.com/hybris">
         <salesOrganization>7350</salesOrganization>     
         <articleNumbers>30019168</articleNumbers>        
         <warehouseIds>EF51</warehouseIds>
          <warehouseIds>ES51</warehouseIds>
           <warehouseIds>7371</warehouseIds>
      </hyb:AvailabilityRequest>
   </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>

Response from SAP
===========

    <SOAP:Envelope xmlns:SOAP="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/">
   <SOAP:Header/>
   <SOAP:Body xmlns:hyb="http://www.distrelec.com/hybris">
      <ns1:AvailabilityResponse xmlns:ns1="http://www.distrelec.com/hybris">
         <erpArticleAvailability>
            <articleNumber>30019168</articleNumber>
            <articleFound>true</articleFound>
            <stockLevels>
               <warehouseId>EF51</warehouseId>
               <available>0</available>
               <articleFoundInWarehouse>false</articleFoundInWarehouse>
            </stockLevels>
            <stockLevels>
               <warehouseId>ES51</warehouseId>
               <available>0</available>
               <articleFoundInWarehouse>false</articleFoundInWarehouse>
            </stockLevels>
            <stockLevels>
               <warehouseId>7371</warehouseId>
               <available>0</available>
               <articleFoundInWarehouse>true</articleFoundInWarehouse>
            </stockLevels>
         </erpArticleAvailability>
      </ns1:AvailabilityResponse>
   </SOAP:Body>
</SOAP:Envelope>

Hello Evangelos Kontopoulos | Lodestone :-

Can you please check the above request / response and figure out why we have a zero stock level for article no 30019168 for DE shop.

Thanks

Hello Neeraj,
The ES and EF codes are not ERP codes. These are custom values we use when we export the stock. These codes cannot be used in the direct requests in SAP and is only for display there.
Hi Evangelos, but even i can see zero stock for <warehouseId>7371</warehouseId> as well. is it correct ?
Neeraj, but on the overview screen also not availability is displayed and this data is not from the online Interface. See screenshot overview screen.
Hi Urs Bebie | Distrelec :- Yes for sap counties , the source of information of this " overview screen" is directly from sap interface IF06_Availability.
Hi Neeraj, are you sure that this is also online via IF06? I thought just if you go to the detailed page. If not you would never use the values we send in the stock file.
Hi Urs, Yes I confirm you this information is coming via IF06. The stock file which is send is used in case of movex country to display the availability information.

Facts:
1.Virtual warehouses cannot be used in IF06
2. Webshop calls IF06 in the detail page, and during the cart calculation
3.Stock for direct shipment products is not hold in standard SAP tables and IF06 always returns 0 stock
4.Information shown is incorrect for these articles.
Solution:
There is a need for a CR which will show the stock for these type of articles. There are two options to achieve this
1. CR on SAP side: A new method needs to be built type IF06 and whenever there are these virtual warehouses included EF* or ES* the method will have to check the same custom tables as it is used in IF03.
2. CR on the Webshop side: When stock is included in the EF* or ES* warehouses then no call should be done in SAP and instead show stock loaded from IF03 directly in HMC.

Performance issues need to be considered for taking the decision.
Evangelos and Neeraj to provide the effort estimation for each of the two possible CRs

@Neeraj, @Evangelos

Performance issues need to be considered for taking the decision.

What are your concerns?

Evangelos and Neeraj to provide the effort estimation for each of the two possible CRs

Please provide estimations.

Thanks
René

In the IF06 we are using a standard BAPI for showing the stock for the standard SAP tables. Now we have to make a custom call which will read the custom table select and sum the stock quantities from the different vendors which are "translated" to ES* and EF* warehouses. This may take some time but I will have to cross check with my dev team.

Challenges in webshop side:-
========================
1. We don't have information on the warehouse level if it is a real or virtual
2. Assuming that we configured missing information at point 1. We will have to adapt the interface for the information coming from IF06 interface.
3. In the if06 call we will have to check the stock level inside the hybris for all virtual warehouse, by looking into the database.
4. I don't have the real time estimation how much cost effective is to look this into database, but we will have to do this on productdetails page also on the cart page.
5. In my opinion and I believe the product detail page is the most visited page and we have already a performance issue with the page with long loading time and addition of this logic could also add some more extra time to render.
6. For all soap call in webshop side we have some types of cache and if we have the information available into cache we avoid to make a real webshop call.

How ever I am still analysis the complexity and areas of changes on the webshop side.

Thanks

Effort is 1,5 days DEV plus 1 day for me for documentation and testing.
My dev team mentioned that performance shouldnt be affected a lot.

Hello guys,
The development is in Q now. Unfortunately I cannot test without your help as I need to see the request and the response. Can we somehow do that tomorrow?
According to Evangelos, this is solved.
Hi Evangelos, can you verify if this works?
As just discussed it is not working.
I adjusted the warehouse configuration for all SAP countries.

attachment.name: RE Warehouses and delivery times on the Webshop.msg

Slovak translation also committed to v4.1.

Zisan, what is missing? Looks OK to me: http://test.distrelec.de/de/computer-hobby/multimedia-und-praesentation/digitalkameras-zubehoer/digitalkameras/dslr-kameras-nikon-und-serie/c/cat-DD-21661?eolCategoryFor=11046551 and http://test.distrelec.de/de/plastik-binderuecken-rundschwarz100-stk-fellowes-5346108/p/12587418?q=12587418&page=1&origPos=1&origPageSize=10&simi=100.0

Eventuelle Alternativen bzw. Nachfolger finden Sie untenstehend." Like i have written on 13 August. The translation that is online is not a correct german sentence.. See also in the attachment

item.title: [DISTRELEC-7212] SEO/UX - Fasterize - Mockup Implementation - cookie
item.description:
Implement a cookie which represents the session state:
logged-in(yes,no),channel(b2b,b2c),language(de,ch,fr,en,...)

so if a customer changes the language, the channel or logge-in then the cookie need to be updated.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Hello Neeraj

Can you please take care of this.
Any news ?
Hi Pierre-Francois Hubert | Distrelec :- i was on vacation for two days , just came back. Hence I will start working soon on this task. Thanks
Ready for testing. Please test it after next deployment from trunk.
This ticket belongs to a pre-release-candidate - Please test immediately in order to have possible bugs fixed until the Golive. Thanks!
Test done on Q, it's ready for P (all case tested).
I had to to a performance optimisation in generating the cookies.
The cookie exists several time (different paths)
I've changed the path of the cookie to "/" and put averithy into one cookie: "session-settings"

@Rene Haemmerli | Distrelec Apparently the cookies do not comply to Cloudfront norm.
Please adapt according to Anthony recommendation :

My colleague added the SSL certificate on our platform. I thought that we were good but I discovered a last problem with CloudFront and its behavior due to the cookie value session-settings.

CloudFront is very strict with the RFC 6265 and doesn't accept ',' (comma) in the cookie value. And in fact, the cookie that you added for the cache key does contain comma in the value : 

Cookie: session-settings="logged-in:false,language:en,channel:B2B"

It results that CloudFront doesn't correctly parse the value and doesn't correctly cache the pages.
For instance, the cookie sent from CloudFront to Fasterize for the previous example becomes truncated.

Cookie: session-settings="logged-in:false

I looked at the RFC and it's stated that the cookie should have the following syntax :

cookie-pair = cookie-name "=" cookie-value cookie-name = token cookie-value = *cookie-octet / ( DQUOTE *cookie-octet DQUOTE ) cookie-octet = %x21 / %x23-2B / %x2D-3A / %x3C-5B / %x5D-7E ; US-ASCII characters excluding CTLs, ; whitespace DQUOTE, comma, semicolon, ; and backslash

Is there any chance that you fix the problem by updating the format used in this cookie ?

When this fix will be done, we should be good.

Checked with René.
The modification is quick, it should be deployable in the next deployment.
replaced ',' by '|' because the comma is not allows in cookies

item.title: [DISTRELEC-7013] Change legal notice on DK; EE, NL, PL, LV, SE, NO, EXP webshop
item.description:
The legal notice on the very left bottom of the LV page (LV-LV) should be changed:

Currently:
© 2015 Distrelec, Daetwyler Switzerland Inc. meitassabiedrība. Visas tiesības paturētas.

Should be changed to:
© 2015 Distrelec, Daetwyler Switzerland Inc. uzņēmums. Visas tiesības rezervētas.
item.summary: Change legal notice on DK; EE, NL, PL, LV, SE, NO, EXP webshop

comments.comment:

Thank you
Laura
Please test after the next deployment

Can be tested here: http://prod.distrelec-lv.distrelec.com/

I don't see any Change on Prod..
why?

I don't see any changes, please reopen this case.
Thanks!

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6919] Movex - Punchoutfilter update issue
item.description:
The punchout filter update is probably not updating properly.
Similar problem like for the EOL issue.

If for example a file is sent to the shop which contains all the punchouts for a customer, then the second time a product is not included anymore in the punchouts then it should be removed from hybris. At the moment this only works if the valid to date is younger than today.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Implementation in trunk:
1. delete all punchouts
2. import all punchouts
3. run the sync job
I will clarify with the ERP team if they exporitng everytime all punchouts.

We require more inputs on Punchout filter update.

1, Is it incremental file or full load file.
2. If it is incremental file and the product is not included in punchout but exist in system and date is also valid then
i. Shall we delete all existing records data from punchoutfilter.
ii. if require to delete few products, then what is the valid criteria for deletion.

Hi Nitin

Once per day they send a FULL export.

Cheers
Will

Hi Will,

Please provide me more information on below -
1. How many files as ERP providing for PunchoutFilter load. I have seen two files erp_punchoutfilt_cu and erp_punchoutfilt_man. Please provide me other files for test the code changes.
2. I have observed below ITEM TYPE in distrelecB2Bcore-items.xml
a. DistPunchOutFilter
b. DistProductPunchOutFilter
c. DistSalesOrgPunchOutFilter
d. DistCUPunchOutFilter
e. DistCTPunchOutFilter
f. DistCOPunchOutFilter
g. DistManufacturerPunchOutFilter
I believe erp_punchoutfilt_man file belongs to DistManufacturerPunchOutFilter TYPE and erp_punchoutfilt_cu file belongs to DistCUPunchOutFilter TYPE. We will delete the records from particular TYPE based on file type. Please confirm on my understanding.
3. It seems it`s not Full load for PunchoutFilter, it is incremental load and full load for specific TYPE. Please confirm.

Many Thanks,
Nitin Deshmukh

Hi Nitin

The punchout API is defined by 4 files in the distrelecB2Bcore-spring-integration-erp.xml:

	<bean id="erpPunchOutFilterCOConverter" class="de.hybris.platform.acceleratorservices.dataimport.batch.converter.impl.DefaultImpexConverter">
		<property name="header">
			<value>#{erpImpexImportHeader}
				# Insert/Update country punch-out-filter
				INSERT_UPDATE DistCOPunchOutFilter[processor=com.namics.distrelec.b2b.core.dataimport.processor.LastModifiedErpImportProcessor];salesOrg(code)[unique=true];country(isocode)[unique=true];product(code,$catalogVersion)[unique=true];productHierarchy[unique=true];validFromDate[dateformat=yyyyMMdd];validUntilDate[dateformat=yyyyMMdd];lastModifiedErp[dateformat=yyyyMMddhhmmss]
			</value>
		</property>
		<property name="impexRow">
			<value>;{+0};{+1};{2};{3};{+4};{+5};{+6}</value>
		</property>
		<property name="type" value="DistCOPunchOutFilter" />
	</bean>

	<bean id="erpPunchOutFilterCTConverter" class="de.hybris.platform.acceleratorservices.dataimport.batch.converter.impl.DefaultImpexConverter">
		<property name="header">
			<value>#{erpImpexImportHeader}
				
				# Replace SAP codes by hybris codes:
				$customerTypeCodeMapping=[cellDecorator=com.namics.hybris.toolbox.impex.text.MultiReplaceTextDecorator][mapping-delimiter=->][replace-mapping0=Z100->B2B][replace-mapping1=Z200->B2C][replace-mapping2=COMPANY->B2B][replace-mapping3=PRIVATE->B2C]
				
				# Insert/Update customer type punch-out-filter
				INSERT_UPDATE DistCTPunchOutFilter[processor=com.namics.distrelec.b2b.core.dataimport.processor.LastModifiedErpImportProcessor];customerType(code)[unique=true]$customerTypeCodeMapping;product(code,$catalogVersion)[unique=true];validFromDate[dateformat=yyyyMMdd];validUntilDate[dateformat=yyyyMMdd];lastModifiedErp[dateformat=yyyyMMddhhmmss]
			</value>
		</property>
		<property name="impexRow">
			<value>;{+0};{+1};{+2};{+3};{+4}</value>
		</property>
		<property name="type" value="DistCTPunchOutFilter" />
	</bean>

	<bean id="erpPunchOutFilterCUConverter" class="de.hybris.platform.acceleratorservices.dataimport.batch.converter.impl.DefaultImpexConverter">
		<property name="header">
			<value>#{erpImpexImportHeader}
				# Insert/Update customer punch-out-filter
				INSERT_UPDATE DistCUPunchOutFilter[processor=com.namics.distrelec.b2b.core.dataimport.processor.LastModifiedErpImportProcessor];salesOrg(code)[unique=true];erpCustomerID[unique=true];product(code,$catalogVersion)[unique=true];productHierarchy[unique=true];validFromDate[dateformat=yyyyMMdd];validUntilDate[dateformat=yyyyMMdd];lastModifiedErp[dateformat=yyyyMMddhhmmss]
			</value>
		</property>
		<property name="impexRow">
			<value>;{+0};{+1};{2};{3};{+4};{+5};{+6}</value>
		</property>
		<property name="rowFilter" ref="customerRowFilter" />
		<property name="type" value="DistCUPunchOutFilter" />
	</bean>
	
	<bean id="erpPunchOutFilterManufacturerConverter" class="com.namics.distrelec.b2b.core.dataimport.batch.converter.impl.DefaultDistImpexConverter">
		<property name="header">
			<value>#{erpImpexImportHeader}
				# Insert/Update customer punch-out-filter
				INSERT_UPDATE DistManufacturerPunchOutFilter[processor=com.namics.distrelec.b2b.core.dataimport.processor.LastModifiedErpImportProcessor];salesOrg(code)[unique=true];erpCustomerID[unique=true];manufacturer(code)[unique=true];validFromDate[dateformat=yyyyMMdd];validUntilDate[dateformat=yyyyMMdd];lastModifiedErp[dateformat=yyyyMMddhhmmss]
			</value>
		</property>
		<property name="impexRow">
			<value>;{+0};{+1};man_{+2};{3};{+4};{+5}</value>
		</property>
		<property name="beforeEachConverting" ref="beforeEachPunchOutFilterManufacturer" />
		<property name="type" value="DistManufacturerPunchOutFilter" />
	</bean>

We get every night a FULL export for each punchout type (that means 4 FULL export files). At the moment we only have data for two types, as you could only find 2 files.

You delete now the all the records according the file / punchout type. Thats the way to do it

If you want, we can do a quick review session in the afternoon.

Thx
Will

Hi Will,

I have validate the code changes with DistManufacturerPunchOutFilter file and it`s seem working fine but observed some data configuration related issue in DistCUPunchOutFilter file. Due to this system not importing DistCUPunchOutFilter file into the local system.

The code changes has been committed in trunk. Please test and validate the code changes.

Many Thanks,
Nitin Deshmukh

Hi Nitin

I quickly reviewed your changes. We should refactor this code for sure. We will test your changes on Q today.

Cheers
Will

Committed to trunk v4.1.0

Next steps:

  • refactoring
We need to change the implementation. Im currently testing the ERP API with Urs. They not only send FULL exports. We will test which files are FULL export and which files are not.

only erp_punchoutfilt_cu is a FULL export in one file. The other punchouts should be cleaned by job: http://jira.distrelec.com/browse/DISTRELEC-948.

Need to change the implementation that we only remove the punchouts with file type erp_punchoutfilt_cu and test the cleanup job as well.

http://wiki.distrelec.com/display/distrelint/IF-05+PunchOut+Filters
reverted changes in branch v4.1

for erp_punchoutfilt_cu we can use the property beforeConverting like here:

	<bean id="erpProductBestSellersConverter" class="com.namics.distrelec.b2b.core.dataimport.batch.converter.impl.DefaultDistImpexConverter">
		<property name="header">
			<value>
				#{erpImpexImportHeader}
				UPDATE DistSalesOrgProduct[processor=com.namics.distrelec.b2b.core.dataimport.processor.LastModifiedErpImportProcessor];product(code,$catalogVersion)[unique=true];salesOrg(code)[unique=true];showBestsellerLabelFromDate[dateformat=yyyyMMddhhmmss];showBestsellerLabelUntilDate[dateformat=yyyyMMddhhmmss]
			</value>
		</property>
		<property name="impexRow">
			<value>;{+0};{+1};{+2};{+3}</value>
		</property>
		<property name="beforeConverting" ref="beforeProductBestSellers" />
		<property name="beforeEachConverting" ref="beforeEachProductBestSellers" />
		<property name="type" value="DistSalesOrgProduct" />
	</bean>

In the beforeConverting bean we simply remove all CU punchouts.
fixed for CU punchouts. ready for Q deployment

@Will

Did you consider, that we receive customer punchout filters from Movex and SAP:

erp_punchoutfilt_cu-D2P275-20151007001656000.csv_20151007012648523
erp_punchoutfilt_cu-D3P275-20151007003347000.csv_20151007033230576
erp_punchoutfilt_cu-20151007120049095.csv_20151007122141124

I will update the solution as discussed.

-rw-r--r-- 1 hybris hybris  732444 Oct  5 23:34 erp_punchoutfilt_cu-D1P275-20151005233158000.csv_20151006002415983.gz
-rw-r--r-- 1 hybris hybris     185 Oct  6 00:16 erp_punchoutfilt_cu-D2P275-20151006001521000.csv_20151006013404609.gz
-rw-r--r-- 1 hybris hybris     185 Oct  6 00:31 erp_punchoutfilt_cu-D3P275-20151006003015000.csv_20151006034946069.gz
  • D1P275 = salesorg 7310 switzerland
  • D2P275 = salesorg 7320 austria
  • D3P275 = salesorg 7330 italy
deactivated removing logic in v4.1.2, need to fix it first
implemented for v4.1.2, ready for Q deployment
Please test! This ticket belongs to next production release.
tested successfully on Q. on P we have issues with importing the CU D1P275 punchout file, salesorg 7310 switzerland.
testing it on Q, issue is reproducable but there is no error message in the log.
bug fixed and committed to trunk. ready for Q deployment.
I will test the fix now on Q.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6527] Set local language as default language
item.description:
It seems that the language selection set up, already mentioned in the ticket 4390 is not yet solved:

  • Set local language as default independently of browser setting.
    -->CH exception: German as default language, FR if browser is in French

At the moment we have many German or French searches in the English channel in Switzerland and Germany, with the consequence that costumers can't find the products.

Thanks,
Laura
item.summary: Set local language as default language

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Hi Laura
We changed the page settings to mandatory because of exactly this reason a few month ago.
This should prevent the customer to use a wrong preconfigured web shop.
Is this still the case?

Hi Florian,

But given our reports it does not seem to have an effect, Therefore, please set as default language the local language as described above.

Thanks,
Laura

Hi Rafael,

This issue has been approved, when will it be implemented?

Thanks for giving an proximate timeline

Laura

We really have some issues with the languages, somehow "switching" every now and then. E.g. I was in the French shop this morning, doing a search and ended up with a product list mainly in French (one product was in German) and all the rest of the site is in German. If customers are presented with that, I doubt that they have a good customer journey.
use the language selected by the user and not the one from the browser.

Hi will,
In addition to that, the first language that appears is always the local language. (English channel only if actively selected by the user). Just have in mind the case of Switzerland where we have 3 languages
thnx,
Laura

Hello Neeraj,

As we talked, please change the BE to make the local language as default.

For CH: local language German. I will change it in the FE if the user has the browser in french.

Commit on trunk.
Send this ticket back to me when you finish.

Thanks

Hi Ruben,

We have made changes in AbstractPageController.java file and committed the changes in trunk.

Please validate the changes.

Thanks,
Nitin

Hi Nitin,

I think we need a way (BackEnd side) to set the default Language. For example to set French in CH.

Something like you did here:

    protected LanguageData getCurrentLanguage() {
    	return getStoreSessionFacade().getDefaultLanguage();
    }

but this time a SET method

Hi Ruben,

Each web store have own default language and we were setting default language in hmc only. The webshop default language information is coming from commercefacades.

The above code is used to set web shop default language instead of browser default language.The set method (setDefaultLanguage()) is part of core extensions.

Now in the Switzerland website when you detect the browser is in French., to change the current Language to FR. use below code
model.addAttribute("currentLanguage", getStoreSessionFacade().getCurrentLanguage());

Thanks,
Nitin

Hello Nitin,

this piece of code that you mention is Back End code:

model.addAttribute("currentLanguage", getStoreSessionFacade().getCurrentLanguage());

How can I call this piece of code from the Front End?
We should implement an Ajax service maybe?

Thanks

Hi Ruben,

Please provide more detailed what kind of help required from backed side. You had mentioned Ajax service required but i am not well aware on existing Ajax service.

Many Thanks,
Nitin Deshmukh

I meant an Ajax call, to a backend service.
You have to implement a Java method (service), to modify this "currentLanguage" attribute based on a parameter sent from the FrontEnd though an Ajax call.
If you need help for the backend please contact Neeraj or Nabil.
Thanks
Ruben

Hi Marc,
can you double check with business please?
Thanks

Hi Nitin,

There is a case in which the webshopt is not taking the correct default language.

Steps to reproduce:

  • Open Firefox.
  • Remove ALL languages in its Settings.
  • Clean the cookies
  • Open www.distrelec.ch

The page should be displayed in DE, because DE is the default language for Switzerland. However, in the lightbox dropdown, we must have DE pre-selected

Hi Ruben,

As discussed, I have checked the code changes in local environment and its looks fine as expected.

The code changes has been committed in trunk. Could you please validate the changes.

Many Thanks,
Nitin Deshmukh

Hi Laura,
please test after the next deployment.
And please talk with Marc Kraft | Distrelec about the functionality
Thanks

attachment.name: Search done in CH-FR, Results mixed FR, DE and page is in DE.png

item.title: [DISTRELEC-8109] Remove order-note from checkout
item.description:
The order-note functionality should be removed from checkout of SE, NO, FI - like it was done for Germany.

See screenshot - red marked part should be removed.

Background: Customer service is not prepared for upcoming amount of manual order-checking.

status.description: This issue was once resolved, but the resolution was deemed incorrect. From here issues are either marked assigned or resolved.

comments.comment: Committed to trunk.
ticket is committed to branch v4.1 and not to the trunk. wrong fix version.

Strange, I had made a switch to trunk and checked in other files also in distrelecB2Bstorefront to trunk w/o problems. Why did this file go to v4.1? It's a mystery...

Now it's checked in to trunk anyway.
hi Erik, please revert your changes in trunk. we are working on branch v4.5 now. commit your changes in this branch.
